mapper.select: select roomtype,roomname,sum(roomprice) as roomprice,roomcapa,min(roomremain) as roomremain from room where houseno=#{houseNo} and roomdate between #{chkIn} and #{chkOut} group by roomtype,roomname,roomcapa order by roomtype

select roomname,roomtype,roomcapa,sum(roomprice) as roomprice from (select roomprice,roomcapa,roomname,roomtype,roomdate from (select houseno,roomprice,roomcapa,roomname,roomtype,TO_DATE(roomdate, 'yy-mm-dd') as roomdate from room) where houseno = #{houseNo} and roomtype =#{roomType} and roomdate between #{chkIn} and #{chkOut} )a group by roomname,roomtype,roomcapa

select roomno from (select roomno,roomtype from (select roomtype,roomno,houseno,TO_DATE(roomdate, 'yy-mm-dd') as roomdate from room) where houseno = #{houseNo} and roomtype =#{roomType} and roomdate between #{chkIn} and #{chkOut} )a
select roomremain from room where roomno = #{roomNo}
mapper.update: update room set roomremain = #{roomRemain} where roomno=#{roomNo}
mapper.select: select * from room where houseno=#{houseNo} and roomdate=#{roomDate}
mapper.update: update room set roomremain=#{roomRemain} where roomno=#{roomNo}
